rules_text:
[i]Villager Origins[/i] – Whenever a creature dealt damage by Alm dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Alm.
[i]Foraging[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Create a Food token for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on them. [i](To forage, exile three cards from your graveyard or sacrifice a Food.)[/i]
